item.description:
Centering Prayer with Fr. Anthony Silvia.

From the very early years of Christianity many of the faithful have sought to deepen their relationship with the Divine through contemplative practice. This workshop will focus on the exercise of Centering Prayer. We will begin with a brief explanation of the practice and its history followed by about 30 minutes of Centering Prayer.

Cost: FREE for Lifetime and Supporting Members of the Theosophical Society, $10 for everyone else.
